description: Demolition of existing buildings and mixed use redevelopment to provide 78 studio / B1 accommodation comprising studio spaces for creative / start-up occupiers, with ancillary communal and gallery spaces; erection of 97 residential dwellings; plus provision of associated landscaping, car parking, motorcycle and cycle parking.
